About Us

We at Re-Cycle strive to offer the best tours of the Norwegian landscape from the seat of a bike. Our company is run by an environmentally concious gruup of hobby cyclists, who believe that nature is best enjoyed when you can do so whilst preserving it.

We have tours for everyone, whether you're an active cyclist or more of a couch potato. This wonderful part of Norway offers leisurely routs along the coastline where you can enjoy the wind in your hair and the sun on your face, and more challenging terrain up some of our many peaks and through green forrests. No matter your physical fittness, we can tailor a tour for you that we know you will like, and we will happily guide you on that tour.
